
=head1 NAME

journal

=head1 DESCRIPTION



=head1 FIELDS

 id (serial) - 
 short_name (character varying(64)) - 
 title (character varying(128)) - 
 print_issn (character varying(128)) - 
 online_issn (character varying(32)) - 
 publisher (character varying(128)) - 
 country (character varying(32)) - 
 url (character varying(128)) - 
 notes (character varying(1024)) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                                              Table "gcis_metadata.journal"
    Column    |          Type           |                      Modifiers                       | Storage  | Description 
 -------------+-------------------------+------------------------------------------------------+----------+-------------
  id          | integer                 | not null default nextval('journal_id_seq'::regclass) | plain    | 
  short_name  | character varying(64)   |                                                      | extended | 
  title       | character varying(128)  |                                                      | extended | 
  print_issn  | character varying(128)  |                                                      | extended | 
  online_issn | character varying(32)   |                                                      | extended | 
  publisher   | character varying(128)  |                                                      | extended | 
  country     | character varying(32)   |                                                      | extended | 
  url         | character varying(128)  |                                                      | extended | 
  notes       | character varying(1024) |                                                      | extended | 
 Indexes:
     "journal_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (id)
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "article" CONSTRAINT "article_ibfk_1" FOREIGN KEY (journal_id) REFERENCES journal(id) MATCH FULL
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
